headline: Sherwin-Williams Acquires BASF's Brazilian Paint Business Suvinil
summary: SHW expands its Latin American footprint with the acquisition of BASF's Brazilian paint brand Suvinil, boosting growth and scale in the region.

headline: Here's Why You Should Add Mosaic Stock to Your Portfolio

headline: Mosaic Announces Completion of Sale of Phosphate Mining Unit in Brazil to Fosfatados Centro
summary: TAMPA, FL / ACCESS Newswire / October 6, 2025 / The Mosaic Company (NYSE:MOS) announced today the completion of its previously announced transaction with Fosfatados Centro SPE Ltda. ("Fosfatados Centro") for the sale of its idled Patos de Minas phosphate ...
